faq_what_answer: Glitch text uses Unicode combining characters to create distorted, creepy text effects. Also known as Zalgo text or cursed text.
faq_how_answer: Glitch text is created by adding Unicode combining diacritical marks above, below, and through regular characters.
faq_safe_answer: Yes! Glitch text uses standard Unicode characters that are supported by most platforms and applications.
faq_platforms_answer: Works on Discord, Roblox, Minecraft, social media, messaging apps, and anywhere that supports Unicode.
